long_description: The Ruffwear Hoopie Dog Collar transitions from city walks to trail adventures without skipping a beat. 1-piece anodized aluminum V-ring provides a strong leash attachment point. Separate ID tag attachment point reduces jingling and helps you avoid accidentally clipping the leash to a tag's split ring. The Ruffwear Hoopie Dog Collar features tubular polyester webbing that is soft and durable; side-release buckle is secure and convenient. Closeout.
short_description: The Ruffwear Hoopie Dog Collar transitions from city walks to trail adventures without skipping a beat.
